Key Match Events: New Zealand won by 9 wickets (with 82 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: England's golden generation is getting on, and they are looking for one more chance to shine
Ben Stokes is a major doubt for this opener with a sore hip
Dawid Malan has been on fire against New Zealand, scoring 277 runs in three innings
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler warned that Ben Stokes may not be risked in the opening match
Tom Latham said that New Zealand will not get carried away by the occasion
Miscellaneous Highlights: The conditions in Gujarat are set to be hot and dry
The pitch has a mix of red and black soil, which could offer a blend of pace and carry
Trent Boult needs three more wickets to reach 200 in ODIs
Others: The teams will contest as many Super Overs as it takes to separate the sides in the event of a tie
England have won four outright and lost five of their ten previous meetings against New Zealand in the World Cup
